name: Click Clack Typing Demo
description:
Click Clack Typing is a challenging 2D Platformer that teaches typing. It can be used as an educational tool both in the classroom and at home. Whether you're learning how to type for the first time or looking for a fun way to increase your words per minute, Click Clack Typing has what you need. 

The complete edition of Click Clack Typing is expected to release in July of 2020. This version is a limited demo of World 1.  It is designed to introduce complete beginners to proper typing technique beginning with home row.  Feel free to email any comments to johndavid@clickclacktyping.com. 

Check out ClickClackTyping.com for updates!
